attributes.action: intoduce a legal right to only work 5 days out of 7
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
under current working time regulations workers can be required to work six days with only one day off (not legaly having to work more than 48 hours)in a seven day week.
this should be changed to allow all workers the right to two days off work in any seven days to provide a work life balance for those that do not whish to work a six day week.
